statements: UPDATE SupplierInformation SET supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE supplier_id = 1
UPDATE SupplierInformation SET payment_terms = 'Net 30 days', email_address = 'john.doe@abcsuppliers.com' WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers'
UPDATE SupplierInformation SET contact_person='John Doe', email_address='john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE SupplierInformation SET payment_terms='Net 30 Days', contact_number='123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_name='ACME Corp';
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_email='info@supplier1.com' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=15.99 WHERE product_id=2;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE supplier_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com', payment_terms = 'Net 30' WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM products WHERE price > 100);
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET price = 25.99, description = 'New description' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE Suppliers SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE Products SET price=99.99, description='New Description' WHERE product_id=5;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE products SET unit_price=15.99 WHERE product_id=2;
UPDATE suppliers SET payment_terms='Net 30' WHERE supplier_id=1
UPDATE products SET unit_price=25.99, supplier_id=2 WHERE product_id=3
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_email='newemail@example.com', payment_terms='Net 30' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=15.99, product_name='New Product' WHERE product_id=5;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_email='newemail@example.com', contact_phone='123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=29.99 WHERE product_id=3;
